Our USP is that we focus on increasing the customer's overall knowledge of the solution that is being implemented. Transparency ensures customer's faith as they feel they are completely involved in the process. Eventually, the solution emerges stronger.
name: Jay Pagnis

idea:
PurpleRibbon is a StartUp healthcare venture into chemotherapy day-care and Onco homecare. The mission is to bring quality cancer treatment and care at the doorstep of the masses. The vision is to open up 500 day-care centres by 2025 across India.
PurpleRibbon (PR) has a unique model of partnering with nursing homes and hospitals having idle bed capacity and leasing few beds to set up their own chemotherapy day-care centres.
The medical team who will be administering chemotherapy are all experienced and trained nurses who will be on rolls of PurpleRibbon and are trained and certified by one of the most reputed cancer hospitals in the country.
PurpleRibbon has developed a cloud-based CRM which handles the entire patient journey and also maintaining all the electronic medical records online. This will enable the patient to go to any of the PurpleRibbon chemotherapy day-care centres across the country and continue his treatment without any hassle.
The need of the hour is to provide a quality and affordable healthcare platform for the masses and that is what PurpleRibbon wishes to address.
name: PURPLERIBBON HEALTHCARE SERVICES PRIVATELIMITED
